author: Michael Pitt
comment: I've just installed this watch face and I'm very impressed so far. Everything looks to be very accurate and the display looks nice and clear too. Read some complaints about the temperature forecast being inaccurate but I think it's just displaying kelvin instead of Fahrenheit or centigrade. That appears to be accurate too. Very happy.

author: Jon Antal
comment: Took forever to get it onto the watch, as it doesn't appear in AW play store? Now that is finally working I have the bizarre 500 degree temps that others are complaining about. Otherwise it's a cool design and the customizations are nice. Fix the temps and I will increase to 5 star.

author: Dainius Nazarovas
comment: Nice watch, highly customizable, the only downside that even if i choose Celsius for current temperature, forecast shows in Farengeit, please fix it and you will get 5 stars.

author: sameer agrawal
comment: Not installing on W atch Moto 360 or Huawei. Wasted Money.

author: Yahel Garcia
comment: One of my favorite faces for my old g watch. Make a Frontire version and I'll definitely buy again

author: Arnaud Soyez
comment: Doesn't work well with AW2, refresh has troubles. On 1.5 It was mostly useless anyway, the weather too often goes blank during the day. I emailed the dev but got no response. Not recommended. Update: still not working as of 11/30/17.

author: Jason Harris
comment: Other than similar experiences to other reviews of being battery hungry,  it's an amazing face.  I get the occasional "android wear has stopped responding" error,  but this may be the fault of the is... not the face.  Thank you to the developers for making MPH and °F available to us Yanks.  Not all of us have been assimilated by the metric Borg yet.

author: Garry Zink
comment: Best looking watch face, but the weather info disconnects all the time. When I use a different watch face I have no trouble. Would give 5 stars once this is fixed. Asus zenwatch 3

author: DaManager
comment: It was my favorite.   The new update removed it from LG G WATCH R.  To bad.

author: Michael Ball
comment: My original comment below was before AW2 was released. I have a G watch R and F04 is still available for use for me. The issue I'm having is with the forecast not being displayed correctly. Looks like each value is being multiplied by 14.65, for example the current temp says 20.0 but the next two forecasts are 293 and 293 (the temperature is unchanged for the next 5 hours). I don't see any responses from DEV so it looks like I'll have to go find a new default watch face.  Everything you want in a multi function weather display. Ambient mode is just as useful and in low light unobtrusive and subtle enough not to be obviously a digital watchface.

author: Lee Callaghan
comment: This face works sometimes on my LG Urbane. Too bad. This was my face of choice for a long time.

author: Alex Chu
comment: After latest update the forecast does not appear correctly (tonight it's going to be 543 fahrenheit).
Temperature has been reading 500°F+ for months now, still no fix.

author: Peter Mortensen
comment: Doesn't show as a watch face in Android Wear 2 after installation. LG G Watch R.

author: Matt Barnes
comment: Very attractive watchface that packs a ton of data into a lovely display. Great color selections too.

author: Andreas Heldal-Lund
comment: At installation on Tag Heuer Connected a lot of the live data is shifted down a little to the right. Now second day it seems to have corrected itself. Looks very nice!
title: This is nice

author: Steven W
comment: My barometer always reads 3.1 inches but I'm not sure if this is a problem with the app or just my phone.
title: Great Face!

author: rjcpdx
comment: Looks great

author: Leo Garcia
comment: Drains the battery in a couple hours when my other watches last all day. Battery life is much better after threats update but it's still buggy. Best watch face so far tho
title: Unusable

author: Dennis Wu
comment: This is my 2nd bought watchface from the same author, great attention to detail! Keep up the great work.
title: Love it

author: Jason Z. Reaño-Lopez
comment: Battery drains a little fast on the LG urbane .  Other than that it is a wonderful watch face
title: "Cool watch"

author: TRUKFIT
comment: Everything you could want in a digital interface.
title: Perfect

author: Andrew Eslick
comment: Excellent

author: Demir Bracic
comment: This has quickly become one of my favourite watch faces. There's a lot on the screen but very easy to read. Add a little bit of a distance it feels all of my friends thinking that this is the actual face and not an LCD screen. The ambiance screen is just as impressive and even better that you can switch the colors. I try other faces but I keep coming back to this one. Excellent job.
title: You guys nailed it.

author: Vic A
comment: Keeps on disconnecting in the setup mode. Sends no info to the watch.  GPS and Wi-Fi on. Galaxy 6S / LG Urbane.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please give us your situation in detail.
I'd like to improve.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Charles Weber
comment: I have no complaints about this face, just wish I knew where the weather data came from. Not completely accurate, but not far off either. Possible future add option to choose where weather data comes from?
title: Love the face and the options

author: Grant Wheatley
comment: I know is say's default US, centigrade readings would be nice. This is 2016 after all. Intelligent app though.
title: Dissapointed there is no option for centigrade

author: Bartek Kandefer
comment: It has everything I need. I wanted to find another watch face but no other comes close to how good this one is.
title: The Best

author: Dov Skipper
comment: Solar events, fore cast and weather displays not showing on Huawei. Edit... need to turn on phone GPS for weather to work. Then if you want you can select fixed location and turn off GPS.
title: Please fix

author: Chad Easley
comment: I keep coming back to this watch face.
title: Awesome watch face, but drains battery

author: Kable Grey
comment: Good looking watch face with all the info I need.  Unfortunately that info is mostly wrong.  The forecast says that the high will be 102 degrees at 5pm. Even here in Florida it doesn't get that hot in October.  The current temperature went from 88 to 77 in a matter of minutes according to the watch. Fix these issues for higher stars

author: Raul Arevalo
comment: Update: Weather is still inaccurate after update.                               Weather displayed does not match actual weather on my phone or anywhere near what the weather actually is in my area! Everything else is awesome. Great design but won't buy any more until they fix the inaccurate weather.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've just updated the app.Would you please update the app to the latest version.
If you have an additional question,please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Inaccurate Weather

author: Michael Knyazev
comment: After upgrade of my Galaxy Note 4 to 5.1.1. the watch is connected all good, but the watchface does not show any info from phone except date and time -- all the other fields are not filled with data
title: Please fix compatibility Android 5.1.1

author: Derek Fakehany
comment: EDIT : Fixed the weather in the latest update. Works great and looks sharp. Great dev!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you please give us your situation in detail.
I'd like to improve.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Stuart Corbett
comment: Weather does not work properly it's just showing a moon for all the weather times and even for tomorrow
title: Great but

author: McGary Chan
comment: Great watch face but humidity is not work

author: Javier Alcoba
comment: Weather and Sun phase has not updated

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please give us more of your situation in detail.
I'd like to improve.Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Doesn't update

author: El S
comment: Nice face would love a color picker or please add a negative display.
title: Color for ambiente

author: Zoltan Fekete
comment: Please add a color picker for the ambient color, instead of the 7 colors picker... in this way we can choose a color with less burn in for the OLED display... Thank you and keep up the great work.
title: Color for ambient mode

author: Paul Yoo
comment: Love everything else but the wrong weather. Should use other source like yahoo..
